categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Dragoneye was a famed bounty hunter. Using scavenged parts from other weapons, he developed his own blaster pistol, the Dragoneye Reaper. As Dragoneye became more and more infamous among the criminal underworld, the popularity of his weapon grew too. Soon many bounty hunters used their own versions of this weapon.
Dragoneye is mentioned in the description of the C-10 "Dragoneye Reaper" pistol that can be looted from killed Kerritamba Wookiees in the Kkowir Forest in Star Wars Galaxies.
